entry.title: Test post to jekyll
entry.content: Here is the text that means nothing… please stop reading it as it is just a test!
entry.summary: Here is the text that means nothing… please stop reading it as it is just a test!

entry.title: Example Draft
entry.content:
What are draft posts?

This is an example of a draft post. Draft posts aren’t included when publishing your site.

This is great for authoring work in progress content, or hiding content that shouldn’t be available at the current time.

entry.title: Welcome to the Forestry Demo Site!

link.title: Welcome to the Forestry Demo Site!

entry.content:
Welcome to the Belkirk College of Engineering Demo Site!

This site allows you to explore Forestry’s features and functionality, and is not meant to be used as a production website. To get started building your own site, please see our documentation.

Thank you for choosing to demo Forestry!
entry.summary: Welcome to the Belkirk College of Engineering Demo Site!
